SELECT REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (reply_num, member_num, com_num, parent_reply_num, reply_content, reply_created_at) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{memberNum}, #{comNum}, #{parentReplyNum}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select level, reply_num, com_num, parent_reply_num, reply_content, reply_created_at, member_num, member_name FROM ( SELECT r.reply_num as reply_num, r.com_num as com_num, r.parent_reply_num, r.reply_content as reply_content, r.reply_created_at as reply_created_at, m.member_num as member_num, m.member_name as member_name FROM reply r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_num = m.member_num WHERE r.com_num=#{comNum} ) START WITH PARENT_REPLY_NUM is null CONNECT BY PRIOR reply_num = PARENT_REPLY_NUM ORDER SIBLINGS BY reply_num
